key_features: Key generation consistency (URL normalization, scheme handling)

tests/unit/cache/badger_test.go.coverage: Expanded unit tests with TTL variations, edge cases, concurrent operations
key_features: Edge cases (empty keys, multiple deletions, Has after Delete, Size after Clear)

patterns_discovered.table-driven_testing: Both unit and integration tests follow table-driven patterns for parameterized test cases
patterns_discovered.temp_directory_management: All tests use t.TempDir() for proper isolation and cleanup
patterns_discovered.phase_testing_pattern: Integration tests use two-phase approach (write then restart then verify)
patterns_discovered.concurrent_operation_testing: Explicit concurrency testing with goroutines and channel synchronization
patterns_discovered.edge_case_comprehensive_coverage: Tests cover zero, negative, empty inputs, and boundary conditions
patterns_discovered.prefix_based_key_generation: Systematic testing of different key prefixes (page:, sitemap:, meta:)
patterns_discovered.url_normalization_testing: URL scheme and trailing slash normalization verified

gotchas_discovered.package_declaration_fix: Required fixing package declarations from 'app_test' to 'cache_test' for proper module structure
gotchas_discovered.testing_short_mode_skip: All integration tests properly skip when testing.Short() is true
gotchas_discovered.context_cancellation_coverage: Added specific context cancellation testing in unit tests
gotchas_discovered.large_value_handling: Explicit testing of 1MB values to verify no size limitations
gotchas_discovered.directory_creation: Testing automatic nested directory creation without pre-existing parent directories

quality_metrics.comprehensive_persistence_testing: 10 integration tests covering all CRUD operations
quality_metrics.edge_case_coverage: Multiple edge cases per operation type
quality_metrics.real_badgerdb_usage: All integration tests use actual BadgerDB instances, not mocks

recommendations.test_maintenance: Consider adding property-based testing for edge cases using tools like https://github.com/flyingmutant/quickcheck
recommendations.performance_profiling: Add benchmark tests for cache operations with varying data sizes
recommendations.stress_testing: Consider adding stress tests with higher concurrent goroutine counts (100+) to test limits
recommendations.memory_usage_monitoring: Add memory usage tracking in integration tests for large value scenarios
recommendations.cache_eviction_testing: Consider adding tests for cache eviction policies when disk space is limited
